member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Facades.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Facades namespace provides classes originaly came from Aspose.Pdf.Kit. These classes are used for manipulating documents perfoming operations like concatenating, stamping, signing, annotating etc. but on the high level without access to a document's inner structure.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Engine.Presentation.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Presentation namespace provides classes that allow to interact with document presentation.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Engine.CommonData.Text.CMaps.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Engine.CommonData.Text.CMaps is a root namespace for all CMap classes.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Optimization.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Optimization is a namespace for classes for managing of document optimization process.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Plugins.IDataSource
member.summary: General data source interface that defines common members that concrete data sources should implement.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Plugins.IOperationResult
member.summary: General operation result interface that defines common methods that concrete plugin operation result should implement.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Plugins.IOperationResult.IsFile
member.summary: Indicates whether the result is a path to an output file.
member.returns: true if the result is a file; otherwise false.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Plugins.IOperationResult.IsStream
member.summary: Indicates whether the result is an output stream.
member.returns: true if the result is a stream object; otherwise false.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Plugins.IOperationResult.IsString
member.summary: Indicates whether the result is a text string.
member.returns: true if the result is a string; otherwise false.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Plugins.IOperationResult.Data
member.summary: Gets raw data.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Plugins.IPlugin
member.summary: General plugin interface that defines common methods that concrete plugin should implement.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Plugins.IPluginOptions
member.summary: General plugin option interface that defines common methods that concrete plugin option should implement.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Plugins.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Plugins is a root namespace for all classes of Aspose.Pdf.Plugins classes which are either directly in it like PdfOrganizer or indirectly through several subnamespaces.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Text.IFontOptions
member.summary: Useful properties to tune Font behaviour

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Text.IFontOptions.NotifyAboutFontEmbeddingError
member.summary: Sometimes it's not possible to embed desired font into document. There are many reasons, for example license restrictions or when desired font was not found on destination computer. When this situation comes it's not simply to detect, because desired font is embedded via set of property flag Font.IsEmbedded = true; Of course it's possible to read this property immediately after it was set but it's not convenient approach. Flag NotifyAboutFontEmbeddingError enforces exception mechanism for cases when attempt to embed font became failed. If this flag is set an exception of type will be thrown. By default false.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Text.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Text namespace provides classes that allow to extract text, add text, manipulate existing text of a document. It also contain classes that allow to extract, replace, substitute fonts of a document.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Text.ITableElement
member.summary: This interface represents an element of existing table extracted by TableAbsorber.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Utils.PublicData.ICosPdfPrimitive
member.summary: Interface for work with PDF data entity

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Vector.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Vector is a root namespace for graphics operations.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Annotations.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Annotations namespace provides classes for working with various types of actions, destinations and other features of document which traditionally called as interactive providing means user can intercommunicate with it.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Annotations.IAnnotationVisitor
member.summary: Defines Visitor for visiting different document annotations.

member.summary: Represents general interface for actions and destinations.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Forms.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Forms namespace has classes which describes forms (standard, static, dynamic) and various types of fields like text box, list box, radio button etc.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Drawing.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Drawing namespace provides classes describing graphic primitives like arc, line, circle etc. Corresponding objects can be used for creating new documents.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.IIndexBitmapConverter
member.summary: This interface declared for customization algorithms of quantization. Users can implement their own realization of this algorithms (for example algorithms based on unmanaged code).

summary.p: The Aspose.Pdf.GroupProcessor namespace provides classes used to work text and fonts.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Devices.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Devices namespace provides classes which are used for representing document as image(s) or a plain text. So document can be sent on to textual or various graphic devices which means we want to get it textual or graphic representation.

member.summary: Defines conversion options related to pipeline configuration.

member.summary: Specifies the size of a portion of pages to pass from node to node.

member.summary: Defines conversion options related to a set of pages to convert.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.IPageSetOptions.ExplicitListOfSavedPages
member.summary: Specifies the array of numbers of pages to convert.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.NamespaceDoc

member.summary: Defines Visitor for visiting different pdf operators.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Operators.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Operators is a namespace for Operator implementations. These classes describes operators used in PDF page contents.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.XfaConverter.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.XfaConverter namespace provides classes that allow to convert XFA.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.IWarningCallback
member.summary: Interface for user's callback mechanism support.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Structure.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Aspose.Pdf.Structure namespace provides classes which help to work with a logical structure of a document which presents the organization of the document into chapters and sections or the identification of special elements such as figures, tables, and footnotes.
